name: lkrssv
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)), wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c1, c4))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` c1)∈(LSubSp ` c3), c3 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c4)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clmod))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c1, c4)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)∈(LSubSp ` c3))
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
⊣ ((c3 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c4)→(c0 ` c1)∈(LSubSp ` c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clmod))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c1, c4)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)))

stmt.origin: lkrlss(c3, c1, c4, c0, cfv(clss, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c3, clmod), wcel(c1, c4)), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(clfn, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(clk, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(clss, c3), cfv(clss, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c3 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c4)→(c0 ` c1)∈(LSubSp ` c3))
⊣ c4 =(LFnl ` c3)
⊣ c0 =(LKer ` c3)
⊣ (LSubSp ` c3)=(LSubSp ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clmod))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(clfn, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(clk, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(clss, c3), cfv(clss, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)⊆ c2)
⊣ ((c0 ` c1)∈(LSubSp ` c3)→(c0 ` c1)⊆ c2)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
⊣ c4 =(LFnl ` c3)
⊣ c0 =(LKer ` c3)
⊣ (LSubSp ` c3)=(LSubSp ` c3)

stmt.origin: lssss(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3), c2, c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cfv(clss, c3)), wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(clss, c3), cfv(clss, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ` c1)∈(LSubSp ` c3)→(c0 ` c1)⊆ c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ (LSubSp ` c3)=(LSubSp ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c3, clmod))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))

-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)⊆ c2)
⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
⊣ c4 =(LFnl ` c3)
⊣ c0 =(LKer ` c3)
⊣ (LSubSp ` c3)=(LSubSp ` c3)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cfv(c0, c1), c2))

comment: The kernel of a linear functional is a set of vectors. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2015.)
